itunes:title: Sending Money To Our Listeners Again!
title: Sending Money To Our Listeners Again!
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
itunes:summary:
Sending money is coming back, going to the hospital this morning, animal attacks, corruption in politics, and a new product is dropping. 


This episode is sponsored by Better Help. Get 10% off your first month of online therapy at https://www.betterhelp.com/lightweight


This is LIGHTWEIGHTS!!
